title: Get LAP TIME-achieved-on-track-layout Relationship
description:
* The ›achieved-on-track-layout‹ relationship for the selected LAP TIME is returned when one exists. -> Status Code \`200\`
* The response contains the relationship ID, the relationship name and the relationship partner.
* An empty response is returned when the selected LAP TIME has no ›achieved-on-track-layout‹ relationship. -> Status Code \`200\`
* Requests with invalid ID are rejected. This can happen when there exists no node with the given ID or it is not a LAP TIME. -> Status Code \`404\`
